mapper.select: select temp_2.id, temp_2.name, department.name as department, temp_2.credit, temp_2.course_type, temp_2.status, temp_2.fees, temp_2.info from (select course.id, course.name, course.credit, course.department, course.info, course.course_type, course.status, course.fees from course join ( select course_id from teacher_course where teacher_id = #{teacher_id}) as temp_1 on course.id = temp_1.course_id) as temp_2 join department on temp_2.department = department.id;
select id from department where name = #{department_name};
mapper.insert: insert into course (id, name, credit, department, course_type, status, fees, info) values (#{course_id}, #{course_name}, #{credit}, #{department_id}, #{course_type}, #{status}, #{fees}, #{info});
